channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Ángel López Jiménez
item.description: Ángel López Jiménez (born 1955) is a Spanish astronomer. Working with Rafael Pacheco, he has discovered numerous asteroids. The Minor Planet Center may also refer to fellow astronomer Álvaro López-García when using "A. Lopez".
